comment_body: A lot of younger NPDs, definitely. Teenage hood was where I was the most outgoing, clothes wise. Now I’m in my thirties I dress normally, vaguely keeping up with the current trend, but not really trying too hard either. Like most people I know in their thirties really.

I do but I generally keep up with high fashion trends and gravitate to a “clean” look

Ralph Lauren white and black T-shirt’s 

Levi’s jeans 

And shoes.

That is my standard day apparel.

Well, I think it will be different but for me personally I have always cut against the grain, I’ve never liked what was popular I’ve always wanted to be different than what the masses were. Not sure if it’s the narcissism or the anti social traits but I’ve always tended to dislike anything that was popular

I usually don't.

I dress however I like, however it makes me feel good. If I don't like a trend, I don't follow it. If I like it, I grab some elements and add to my style.
Ya. Narcs follow the next biggest narc!!!!!! I hate you alllll.
Aw, what's the matter? Did a mean narc steal your candy?

Sorry to hear that Harold. However, this is a peer support group for people with NPD to help each other understand the disorder. Your comments are really unhelpful. I’m sure you can find a sub for people who hate narcs. This is not that sub.
Do you hate us cause you’re weak and easily manipulated and did I mention weak? Know with us it’s not personal you’re just disposable.

where d sub for people who’s lifes have been ROOND! by narcs?!?!?!?!??????()????!!!!!????

Where u want meee go???????
I don’t know. Try performing your own search. I’m only saying this is not the sub you’re looking for.
I did. None there. Besides I hate you all so here I am. I want you to see what you did. Narcs RUIND ME!!!!!!!! If u don’t see what u did u never lern!!!!!!!!
You’ll have better luck finding someone who cares here r/AskNPD
